community_listings.title: Rhizome Community - Cloudflare Protected
community_listings.description: The Rhizome.org community page is protected by Cloudflare's bot detection system, which prevents automated scraping without browser automation tools like Playwright or Selenium. Standard HTTP requests receive a 403 Forbidden error and JavaScript challenge page.

error: HTTP 403 Forbidden - Cloudflare JavaScript challenge required

solution.description: To enable automatic fetching, the workflow needs browser automation
requirements: Modify scraper to use browser automation
solution.manual_access: Visit https://rhizome.org/community/ in a browser to view current listings

note: This file documents the access limitation encountered on October 30, 2025. The scraper scripts are available in the scripts/ directory for future enhancement when browser automation is enabled in the workflow.
